Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections of human breast cancer

Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dako FLEX Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α, Clone EP1, Ready-to-Use immunohistochemistry antibody for breast cancer tissue assessment
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use to semi-quantitatively detect human estrogen receptor α in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast cancer tissue sections via immunohistochemistry, aiding assessment of estrogen receptor status in breast carcinomas
